TopicTitle: Fixed part speed after splashdown on kerbin

Articles.Content:
KSP Version: 1.0.2.842

What Happens: Probodobodyne OKTO,Mk2-R Radial-Mount Parachute and heat shield 1,25m maintaining velocity

Mods / Add-Ons: Stock

Steps to Replicate: 

1)Continue saved game: 'KSA'

2)Load save: 'Bug Retry#1'

3)Survive atmosfeer (decouple and always point retrograde)

4)Time warp until you're almost about to hit the water

Result: Parts maintaining speed in a direction, ignoring all physics. Timewarping in space doesn't speed up the craft.

Fixes/Workarounds: 

Not found

Other Notes/Pictures/Log Files:

Video: [https://youtu.be/d8cm0vEqDxE](https://youtu.be/d8cm0vEqDxE)

Saves and craft: [Link Mediafire](https://www./folder/pcac3h3btp019/KSP_Bug)
